channel.title: Newsroom on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers
channel.description: Recent content in Newsroom on Seasalt.ai - Anyone, Anywhere. Natural, Personalized, and Actionable Conversations with Customers

item.title: Seasalt.ai Launches SeaX in Singapore: Unified WhatsApp & Voice AI Platform
item.description:
Seasalt.ai Launches SeaX in Singapore: Omnichannel 24/7 Customer Engagement Platform Combines WhatsApp and Phone in One Unified Interface

SINGAPORE — Seasalt.ai, a leading conversational AI company, today announced the official launch of SeaX, its groundbreaking omnichannel 24/7 customer engagement platform, in Singapore. Designed to unify WhatsApp, phone calls, and chat automation into a single intuitive interface, SeaX is purpose-built for the multi-channel, multi-lingual, and multicultural communications landscape of Singapore — a blueprint for the global market.

item.title: Seasalt.ai連續兩年選入台灣AI新創地圖
item.description:
台灣AI新創地圖是由財團法人人工智慧科技基金會 (AIF) 、AppWorks 、台灣智慧雲端服務股份有限公司聯合製作，每半年更新一次，旨在推動台灣AI產業的發展和創新。今年的新創地圖中，共有多家企業入選，我們很榮幸能夠與這些企業一起，為台灣的AI產業注入新的能量。

作為一家同時支援文字和語音的AI新創，Seasalt.ai很榮幸能夠連續兩年（2023台灣AI新創地圖、2024台灣AI新創地圖）被選入台灣AI新創地圖！這不僅是對我們團隊的肯定，也是對我們在AI領域持續努力的認可。透過我們的持續更新的自然語言處理(NLP)和語音識別技術(Speech Recognition)，以及各項基於生成式AI的產品應用，我們希望能夠為長照健康、醫療照護、客服中心等領域提供更好的服務，讓台灣的AI產業發展更快速、更智慧。

2023台灣AI新創地圖

過去的一年裡，我們持續在台灣市場深耕，並且在國際市場上拓展業務，我們的產品和服務也獲得了更多客戶的肯定和信任。其中，SeaChat的文字＋語音客服助理和SeaMeet的會議AI助理，都獲得了不少企業客戶的採用。我們會繼續開發有創新、有價值的產品，為台灣的AI產業持續注入新的能量。

我們感謝所有支持我們的合作夥伴和客戶，你們的信任和支持是我們前進的動力。

2024台灣AI新創地圖

item.title: Seasalt.ai聯手Patientsforce采鋐健康推出醫務語音AI客服
item.description: 第 5 屆台北國際照顧博覽會即日起至 9 月 14 日（六），於台北南港展覽館 1 館 4 樓盛大展開。PatientsForce 將於本屆博覽會攤位 M0601、0603 中，與美國位於西雅圖的 AI 新創公司 Seasalt.ai 共同推出全新醫務語音 AI 解決方案，讓 AI 語音客服不但能當總機接電話，還能打電話給長者及病人做四癌篩檢通知及回診服務。

item.title: Nylas Partners with Seasalt.ai to Help Asia Pacific and Japanese Organizations Unlock Conversational AI and Developer Productivity
item.description: PALO ALTO – March 27, 2024 – Nylas, the state-of-the-art communications platform giving developers universal access to email, calendar, and contacts providers through a single API integration, today announced a strategic partnership with Seasalt.ai, a leader in cloud communications AI technologies. Under the terms of the partnership, multinational companies harnessing both Nylas and Seasalt.ai can seamlessly build email and scheduling features into their applications and contact centers without needing to commit significant time and resources. Additionally, customers will have access to dynamic AI capabilities to enhance customer conversations and satisfaction.

item.title: Nylas聯手Seasalt.ai，協助亞太及日本企業導入對話生成式 AI 、提升開發者生產力
item.description: PALO ALTO, 美國加州 – 2024年3月27日, 2024 – Nylas是一個先進的通信平台，為開發人員提供用於電子郵件, 日程和聯絡人功能集成的API服務。Nylas 今日宣布與雲通信及對話生成式AI技術領導者Seasalt.ai建立戰略合作夥伴關係。確立合作夥伴關係後，跨國企業無需投入大量時間和資源，就可以使用 Nylas 和 Seasalt.ai 的服務將電子郵件和排程功能無縫集成到他們的應用程式和客服中心。此外，客戶還可以使用多樣 AI 功能來增強客戶對話和滿意度。

item.title: Seasalt.ai Becomes a Reseller of Twilio Flex
item.description: SEATTLE – Seasalt.ai signed an agreement with Twilio to resell Twilio Flex, enabling them to directly sell Twilio Flex to end customers in China, Hong Kong and Taiwan. This announcement strengthens the existing strategic relationship between the two companies and amplifies their combined vision to enhance customer experience using conversational AI in contact centers.

item.title: Seasalt.ai 成為Twilio Flex香港、中國和台灣市場唯一代理商
item.description: Seasalt.ai 與 Twilio 簽署了首個經銷合同，將 Twilio 的旗艦 SaaS 產品 Twilio Flex 銷售到香港、中國和台灣。兩家公司日益增長的合作關係將加速實現他們在亞太地區使用對話 AI 提升客戶體驗的共同願景。

item.title: What Does Seasalt.ai Really Do?
item.description:
Hi there!

My name is Amy, and I am here to answer the not-so-obvious question: what does Seasalt.ai do?

item.title: 革新對話體驗，Seasalt.ai推出新一代生成式AI聊天機器人SeaChat
item.description:
隨著人工智慧（AI）領域的不斷演進，AI正逐漸成為人們工作和生活中的得力助手。然而，在這股AI浪潮下，企業和個人對於如何與AI協作、共同成長，成為了關鍵所在。AI新創Seasalt.ai於近日宣布，於2023年10月26日正式推出旗下最新力作SeaChat，一款經過精心打造的全新GPT聊天機器人，其獨特之處在於能夠客製化滿足台灣市場的特殊需求，例如LINE整合、人工客服輔助等。無論是與客戶互動、內部知識傳遞還是協作工作，SeaChat都將成為企業和個人的得力幫手。

革新對話體驗，SeaChat擁有獨特優勢

SeaChat的功能設計極具革命性，不僅能夠實現自然流暢的對話，還能夠以簡單易行的方式製作並且上線自己的機器人，期間不需要編程、工程師協作。這款聊天機器人倚賴生成式AI大語言模型的理解能力，能夠靈活理解用戶提問，並提供自然而然的回應。同時，用戶無需擁有程式編寫的專業知識，只需提供所需知識，即可迅速啟動機器人。Seasalt.ai強調，只需短短十分鐘，用戶就能夠輕鬆投入與機器人的對話中。

而在擴充更新方面，SeaChat同樣表現出色。該聊天機器人能夠根據已有知識，快速回答用戶提問，並且在擴充新內容時無需重新訓練，僅需納入對應知識即可。此外，SeaChat還能夠將手上的資料轉化為機器人的知識庫，實現語意分析，並且支援超過20種常見文件格式的匯入，如網頁、文件、試算表和PDF等。更令人驚喜的是，SeaChat還能夠與Shopify或Zendesk等資料庫進行無縫整合，大幅提升了機器人的多功能性。

進一步提升用戶體驗的功能也在SeaChat中得到了充分體現。用戶能夠自行設定機器人的介面，包括外觀、色系、字型等，以符合品牌的需求和定位。同時，品質分析工具的加入也讓對話內容得到了有效監控和改進，使得對話質量得以不斷提升。而對於關心趨勢和對話分析的用戶來說，SeaChat提供的對話指標分析功能，能夠提取熱門話題，監控對話使用情況，實現了對客戶體驗的全面把握。

「生成式AI和其核心技術之一大語言模型漸漸成為人們工作生活中的好幫手。用戶也開始明白AI應該不會馬上取代人，但懂得和AI協作的企業和人才能勝出！」Seasalt.ai的聯合創始人姚旭晨在接受採訪時這樣表示。他進一步指出，隨著市場的需求逐漸多元化，期待一款能夠真正解決客戶問題、提升工作效率的聊天機器人已成為當前的迫切需求。

揮別繁瑣，聊天機器人上線時間從3個月縮短至10分鐘

傳統舊型機器人的種種繁瑣製作過程已被全新的機器人模型所徹底改變。舊型機器人的製作流程複雜而冗長，需要定義情境、搜集資料、設計對話、進行NLU擴充（intent & entity），甚至需耗費專業開發團隊長達兩三個月的時間。一次次的訓練、測試，繁瑣的過程令人望而生畏，才能謹慎地將機器人投入實際運用。然而，即便經過這一番辛苦，舊型機器人仍難以在面對域外知識時游刃有余。

item.title: 大語言模型引領「大航海時代」 SeaMeet助您高效會議
item.description:
ChatGPT等大語言模型的推出，為生成式AI開創了嶄新的「大航海時代」。在這場AI革命的浪潮中，擅長自然語言處理和語音識別多年的Seasalt.ai推出了引領未來會議體驗的解決方案。SeaMeet，一款強大的軟體即服務（SaaS），正在重新定義著下一代會議體驗。

SeaMeet 專為台灣市場打造

SeaMeet是專注於台灣市場的會議協助工具，其語音識別技術專門針對台灣口音優化，滿足台灣用戶的特定需求。同時，SeaMeet能夠輕鬆切換語言模式，支援多語言環境，無論是中文還是英文，都能夠輕鬆應對。

SeaMeet融合了前瞻性技術，為會議帶來了一場煥然一新的變革。無論是實時生成多語言逐字稿、主題摘要、待辦事項，還是情感分析，SeaMeet都能輕鬆應對。獨特的語音辨識技術不僅可以準確地識別每句對話的說話人，還能支援中文、英文逐字稿以及中英文夾雜逐字稿。

SeaMeet 亮點：實時逐字稿和大語言模型定制化

SeaMeet是首家支持實時會議逐字稿的會議協助工具。實時會議逐字稿能夠讓會議中途參加者迅速了解會議細節。不僅如此，SeaMeet還支持實時分段會議總結功能。任何會議用戶都可以迅速瀏覽剛剛討論過的議題，而不需要逐字逐句閱讀所有會議內容。

對於大型企業客戶，SeaMeet支持大語言模型定制化。不為常人知的行業術語等皆可輕鬆識別。做到會議記錄精準又保持了企業自身特色。大語言模型定制化可以確保企業用戶得到準確的會議記錄，並且不洩露咨詢，是大語言模型應用中一舉兩得的殺手應用。

SeaMeet 亮點：AI Copilot填補台灣市場空白

更為引人矚目的是，SeaMeet AI Copilot能夠協助撰寫智能筆記，並在會議結束後，輕鬆將筆記分享至雲端平台如Google Docs，與團隊共享。團隊成員可以在共同的筆記中協作，不僅可以新增議程和會議目標，還能插入圖片和表格，並在其他會議中使用已儲存的範本。此外，SeaMeet提供了方便的會議清單，支援多種篩選方式，讓用戶輕鬆找到所需的會議資訊。

item.title: Sub Topic Summaries for Google Meet; Speech Recognition for Dutch English Accent
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] Google Meet Gets More Focused Summaries with Sub-Topics!
  2. [Product] SeaVoice Nails Dutch English Accent on Discord Speech Recognition

Google Meet Gets More Focused Summaries with Sub-Topics!

When a meeting gets very long, the summaries get long too. Distracted in browsing the summaries? We solved it by adding a topic prefix to each summary, for instance, “Seattle Trip: Amy talks about her recent trip to Seattle and shares details about the places she visited and the food she ate.” Give SeaMeet a try for all your transcription needs today!

item.title: SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy; Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Improvements
  2. [Product] Generative AI Chatbots with SeaChat

SeaVoice Speech-to-Text Accuracy Reaches New Accuracy Milestones

The SeaVoice Speech-to-Text engine has recently broken through to new heights, placing in the top three when compared to a variety of STT systems from companies like Azure and Google, and outperforming Google Chirp. Give SeaVoice a try for all your transcription needs today!

item.title: SeaX Voicemail; SeaVoice on Bias Breakers; New SeaX Messaging Notifications
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaX Introduces Voicemail Automations
  2. [Highlight] Seasalt.ai Partners with Bias Breakers Podcast
  3. [Product] New Notification Features in SeaX Messaging

SeaX Introduces Voicemail Automations

The SeaX Contact Center can now handle customer voicemails! When a customer is not able to get through to an agent, the SeaX Contact Center will record their voicemail and assign it as a task to the next available agent, ensuring that customers get the fastest possible callback and don’t have to wait in long hold lines. The platform can also automatically notify a supervisor when new voicemails come into the system.

SeaVoice Discord Bot Supports New Languages

We are excited to announce that we have added 10 new languages to our speech-to-text support for the SeaVoice Discord bot! When you use the /recognize command, you can now select from the following languages:

item.title: CoPilot for Google Meet; SeaVoice Discord Bot Tutorial; ChatGPT Contact Centers
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet
  2. [Highlight] Refreshed Video Tutorial for SeaVoice Discord STT/TTS Bot
  3. [Webinar] ChatGPT-Powered Contact Centers: Transforming Customer Support in the Digital Age

SeaMeet is your CoPilot for Google Meet (available for English/Chinese)

We released SeaMeet on Google Workspace Marketplace! It transcribes your meeting, extracts topics, todo actions, and summarizes in real-time. It is available for both English and Chinese. Early testers get free access. Please drop us a line if you are interested!

item.title: SeaVoice Nails Code Switching; Discord Server Boosting; ChatGPT Ecommerce Bot
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Highlight] SeaVoice Nails Code Switching in Automatic Speech Recognition
  2. [Product] Discord - Your server has been boosted!
  3. [Product] ChatGPT Powered Upsell Ecommerce Bot

SeaVoice Nails Code Switching in Automatic Speech Recognition

Seasalt.ai’s speech team has been working hard (notice the 12:18AM timestamp? 🤣) on introducing multilingual speech recognition capabilities in our service! Native speakers of one language (such as Chinese) sometimes heavily mix another language (English) in their speech. It is a difficult task because the other language is often spoken by non-native speakers.

item.title: WhatsApp Auto Reply; Leveraging GPT for CX; Insights from United CX
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [Product] SeaX Contact Center Adds Auto Reply for WhatsApp
  2. [Webinar] Seasalt.ai CEO Xuchen Yao Talks Leveraging GPT for More Effective Customer Service
  3. [Highlight] Customer Service at United Airlines: the Good, the Bad and the Ugly

SeaX Contact Center Adds Auto Reply for WhatsApp

We are excited to introduce new features for the WhatsApp channel in the SeaX Contact Center. You can now set up keywords and automatic replies to handle the simple conversations and frequently asked questions that your customers message you about. A lightweight solution for automating your messaging flow when you don’t need a complicated IVR!

SeaVoice STT/TTS Discord Bot gives Moderators More Control over Voice Channel

The SeaVoice Discord bot introduces two exciting new commands to tailor its use to your preference!

Text-to-Speech Discord Bot Case Study

Our SeaVoice Discord bot has now been added to nearly 800 servers, and is used daily to provide STT and TTS to Discord users. Discord users are loving the speech-to-text function in a number of situations, including:

item.title: 2名語音AI博士再創Seasalt.ai：立足台灣「搶東南亞客服市場」
item.description:
多數科技公司如Google、微軟（Microsoft）、亞馬遜（Amazon）都已發展「語音AI」相關應用服務，但事實上，語音轉文字的在地化、流暢度及跨國跨境的管理整合，仍有諸多門檻。為此，AI雲端通訊服務Seasalt.ai團隊看到商機，瞄準1,000多個語種的東南亞市場，近期更聯手美國雲端通訊服務商龍頭Twilio合作、提供解決方案，力拚成為東南亞獨角獸。

單擊此處閱讀全文

item.title: 2位語音AI專家創Seasalt.ai要征服東南亞1,000種方言的客服市場
item.description:
儘管語音AI客服並不是一個新穎的創業題目，甚至微軟、亞馬遜、Google旗下的雲端服務內都有對應的工具，但是Seasalt.ai的共同創辦人暨執行長姚旭晨卻認為這是好事。

「代表這是確定有需求的市場了，我們不用重新探險。」姚旭晨笑著說，Seasalt.ai看到的機會，則是上述那些巨頭們沒有覆蓋到的市場——蓬勃發展的東南亞。

單擊此處閱讀全文

item.title: No Jitter Interviews Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao
item.description: No Jitter recently asked Seasalt.ai CEO and Co-Founder Xuchen Yao to talk about Seasalt.ai’s speech recognition technology and how it is used in the company’s SeaVoice and SeaX platforms. The article also discusses how Seasalt.ai is focusing on the underserved Southeast Asian market.

item.title: Twilio/Seasalt.ai go to APJ; UnTechCon on Discord; Auto Dialer
item.description:
In this edition:

  1. [News] Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ
  2. [Conference] UnTechCon Transcribes Large Discord Audio Channels with SeaVoice
  3. [Product] SeaX Highlight – Auto Dialer

Seasalt.ai and Twilio Release SeaX to APJ

Seasalt.ai and Twilio have officially expanded our partnership to Asia Pacific and Japan, bringing SeaX to customers in the APJ region. The SeaX Quick Start Bundle enables us to launch an out of the box contact center in days, while still allowing for customization, to give customers the contact center they need when they need it.

item.title: Twilio and Seasalt.ai Expand Partnership in Asia Pacific & Japan to Build Multi-Country Cloud Contact Centers
item.description: Twilio and Seasalt.ai announce the expansion of their partnership to Asia Pacific and Japan. Seasalt.ai builds on the Twilio customer engagement platform with SeaX, a quick deployment bundle the streamlines the rollout of complete multi-country cloud contact centers.
